easieRstations 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

easieRstations: Easy selection of weather stations using a shiny app and leaflet

easieRstations-package.Rd

Provides a wEAther Station pIckER (EASIER) for 'NCEI' Global Summary of the Day, 'GSOD', and Australian Bureau of Meteorology, 'BOM', weather stations through a 'leaflet' driven 'shiny' interface to automate the download of selected weather stations' data using 'GSODR' or 'bomrang'.

See also
